attributes.action: Declare the EU Referendum to have been corrupted by deceit and the result void.
attributes.additional_details:
Evidence:
 "We send £350 million a week to the EU. Let's spend that on the NHS instead"
"We will curb immigration"

No one in the Leave campaign actually gave any target figures, at any time, ever. Conservative MEP Dan Hannan has already said this morning that people expecting immigration to come down will be "disappointed".

We aren't going to give £350 million a week to the NHS.

We aren't going to be in the EU single market without allowing free movement of labour.
attributes.background: We the undersigned, believe that the EU Referendum was won through false promises and massive lies by political figures and irresponsible media. It was a blatant abuse of the democratic process. Democracy relies on full and honest information. The result must be declared null and void by Parliament.
